front.title: Cryptographic Token Key Initialization Protocol (CT-KIP) Web Service Version 1.0 Revision 0

author.organization: RSA, The Security Division of EMC
RSA, The Security Division of EMC

abstract.t: This document defines a SOAP-based Web Service interface intended for use by implementor's of the Cryptographic Token Key Initialization Protocol (CT-KIP) to support four-pass (i.e., two round-trip) cryptographic token key initialization. Reader familiarity with CT- KIP is required.
